extendedInfo.description: !!!Please download "Amazing Price Tracker Platinum", this one is out of maintenance!!!How many times have you missed the suddenly price drop on amazon? Can you afford to miss them again? This is the tool you would need to trace amazon price, so you would not lose your big deal again.The most accurate Amazon price + shipping tracker comparing to any other Amazon price tracker sites.Now you can also import your wishlist from Amazon US.Support price tracking for Amazon, Walmart, Target and eBayYou can get noticed when price is below your alerting line or out of stock item get availableYou also easily find the filter items if you are slightly below the super saver free shipping lineYou can monitor price change by dragging the build in Amazon price dashboard widget to your home screen.  You also can monitor Amazon lightning deal from the price widget. If you like, you can also share your deal with your friends via facebook linkThe tracked highest and lowest price are also shown in the widget.All Amazon sites like US, UK, IT, FR, DE, CN, JP, CA and ES are supported.All things are fantastic but not the only things this soft can do, you may also want to search at dealsea, dealcatcher and all those big deals site, then try put in your keyword and see what you can get!If the tool works for you, please give it 5 star. If not, let me know. I appreciate your help to keep improving this tool!

reviews.title: Crap!
reviews.comment: Was just tidying up apps on my phone, putting into relevent folders. Came across this one I\'d downloaded at some point. Typed in some common items. Kept saying item not found. Either I\'m doing something wrong or this app is crap? Think it\'s the app myself. Am going to give it one more go, if no luck then it\'s off to uninstall heaven for this app!
reviews.author: Mark Williams

reviews.title: Really?
reviews.comment: Constantly running, consuming battery, eating data....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Ugly UI, great functionality, I would like to only see Amazon Prime results.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Uses way too much data
reviews.comment: I have not had anything listed for tracking for the past month but yet this app has used 500mb of data. Why?!? Uninstalling now.

reviews.title: Tons of background data!
reviews.comment: App is loading tons of background data while doing virtually nothing for me.  Suspect it is malware.  Uninstalled.
